statements: UPDATE HumanitarianAid SET donation_amount = 2000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE HumanitarianAid SET organization_name = 'Red Cross' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE HumanitarianAid SET donation_amount = 1500, organization_name = 'UNICEF' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE beneficiaries SET age = 25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE donations SET amount = 1000.00 WHERE donation_id = 1;
UPDATE beneficiaries SET address = 'New Address' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE organizations SET org_name='New Name' WHERE org_id=1;
UPDATE organizations SET org_type='New Type' WHERE org_id=2;
UPDATE organizations SET org_name='Updated Name', org_type='Updated Type' WHERE org_id=3;
UPDATE aid_agencies SET country='New Country' WHERE agency_id=1;
UPDATE aid_workers SET skills='Updated Skills' WHERE worker_id=2;
UPDATE aid_requests SET request_description='Updated Description' WHERE request_id=3;
UPDATE organizations SET org_name = 'New Organization Name' WHERE org_id = 1;
UPDATE volunteers SET vol_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE vol_id = 1;
UPDATE donations SET donation_amount = 1000.00 WHERE donation_id = 1;
